body: Can we please use regular `for` loops when we iterate over multiple things? I find the mutable `index` pattern really annoying, as it only works if you iterate over 2 things. I'd stick to a rule of 1 item = range-based, 2+ items = old-style for loop.
body_html: Can we please use regular for loops when we iterate over multiple things? I find the mutable index pattern really annoying, as it only works if you iterate over 2 things. I'd stick to a rule of 1 item = range-based, 2+ items = old-style for loop.
body_text: Can we please use regular for loops when we iterate over multiple things? I find the mutable index pattern really annoying, as it only works if you iterate over 2 things. I'd stick to a rule of 1 item = range-based, 2+ items = old-style for loop.
